products.name: ZX7 Speaker
products.description: Stream high-quality sound wirelessly with minimal to no loss. The ZX7 speaker uses high-end audiophile components that represent the top-of-the-line powered speakers for home or studio use.
features: Flat diaphragm tweeter cone for fast response rate and excellent high frequencies.
Woofers made from aluminum for unique and clear sound.
XLR inputs for connectivity to a mixer.
Encased MDF wooden enclosure to minimize acoustic resonance.
Dual connectivity options: Bluetooth or traditional optical and RCA input.
Included wireless remote for easy volume control and input source switching.

products.name: ZX9 Speaker
products.description: Upgrade your sound system with the all-new ZX9 active speaker. It’s a bookshelf speaker system that offers truly wireless connectivity -- creating new possibilities for more pleasing and practical audio setups.
features: Multiple connectivity options: Bluetooth, optical, digital coaxial, USB Type-B, stereo RCA, and stereo XLR inputs.
Improved Bluetooth technology offers near-lossless audio quality at up to 328ft (100m) range.
Planar diaphragm tweeter for clear, natural-sounding highs.
6.5” aluminum alloy bass unit for powerful room-shaking bass.
Responds to subtle waveforms for new sensations from old songs.
